text: spot of the macula 50% Athetosis - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Bone-marrow foam cells - Constipation - Diffuse reticular or finely nodular infiltrations - Failure to thrive - Feeding difficulties in infancy - Foam cells with lamellar inclusion bodies - Hepatomegaly - Hyporeflexia - Infantile onset - Intellectual disability - Lymphadenopathy - Microcytic anemia - Muscle weakness - Muscular hypotonia - Osteoporosis - Protuberant abdomen - Recurrent respiratory infections - Rigidity - Sea-blu
